channel.title: [SHOWOFF] My near perfect hitsplats! (Same as current RS)
channel.description:
Just need to figure out how to import fonts into the client.
Melee: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489286/melee-new.gif[/img]
Range: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489287/range-new.gif[/img]
Mage: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489288/mage-new.gif[/img]
Critical: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489280/critical-new.gif[/img]
Curse Reflect: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489289/reflect-new.gif[/img]
Absorb: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489278/absorb-new.gif[/img]
Cannon: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489279/cannon-new.gif[/img]
CUSTOM TYPES: Earth: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489281/earth-new.gif[/img]
Fire: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489284/fire-new.gif[/img]
Ice: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1489285/ice-new.gif[/img]
Also have disease, poison, and healing but didn't have time to get gifs

item.title: [SHOWOFF] My near perfect hitsplats! (Same as current RS)
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Wrong. Not to mention, if it was pvp, pvm, the hit splats of the monster (if they hit), are darker than yours.

Also you see the shield on every defend.

and the font is wrong, but i like it now.

Read full topic

What is so cool about this?

still more than the majority can do
[/quote]
The majority can’t use a compiler.[/quote]

Does this tutorial work for all versions, including 562’s?[/quote]

Not for 562’s because the class’s and codes are all different.
